title: Pina Colada Ice Cream
subtitle: Cookinstructions
maintext: Cut the pineapple into small pieces and freeze them. Mix the frozen pineapple with the coconut milk and the rum. Put the mixture in the freezer for 2 hours. Stir the mixture every 30 minutes.
